Controller
Class ReferenceFileParser

java.lang.Object
  Controller.ReferenceFileParser

public class ReferenceFileParser
extends java.lang.Object

ReferenceFileParser is the class which will parse Reference Files. It will also implement an ActionListener, so that when users select a file, only the first row (header) is read.

Method Summary
 void parse()
          This function shall parse all the reference files.

          Adds the header row to the List in the ModelInterface
